core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Industrial Precision with Digital Neon.
Emotion First: The user should feel 'Empowered' and 'Ahead of the Curve'.
Content is King: Every ROI stat must look like a headline.
Zoom In: Use macro shots of robotic arms and focused team faces.
Negative Space: Use deep black voids to make data pop.
anti_patterns: Purple/Teal gradients everywhere (Use distinct, solid electric colors instead).
Generic Stock Photos (Use high-contrast, moody industrial/office shots).

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients on text unless it's a very subtle shine.
Dark mode is the default. Do not create a light mode unless specifically requested by user toggle (but default to dark).
Use 'Outfit' font for all headings. Import from Google Fonts.
Borders should never be solid grey. Use white/10 or white/5.
All cards must have a subtle hover lift (-2px) and glow.
Ensure 'data-testid' is present on all interactive elements.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'Outfit' font from Google Fonts immediately in index.css.
3. Create a 'Layout' component that handles the navigation and footer.
4. Use the provided image URLs for the specific sections (Manufacturing vs Service).
5. When building the ROI calculator, use the 'Close up of robot arm' image as a subtle background overlay with 90% opacity black layer on top.
6. For the Tool Comparison, use the logos provided. If a logo fails to load, fallback to a text badge with the tool name.
